channel.title: How do I make a npc say something above its head?

item.title: How do I make a npc say something above its head?
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“RuNIg jAvAA, post:3, topic:158180”]Allowed:

  • Questions about the Moparscape Client
  • Questions about the Forums
  • Questions about the Web client
  • Questions about the Server status list

NOT allowed:

  • Questions about Private Servers (Ex.: Problems coding your server)
  • Questions about other clients (Ex.: Silabsoft Client)
  • Advertising Development Teams
  • Advertising a site or server.

Please use the Development/Help Section.[/quote]Reason why your warned is for probley posting spam this is devolepment/help
